content: crochet star motif measurements finished size approx 11 x 11 cm depending on hook and yarn used bendigo woollen mills yarn requirements classic luxury or cotton 8 or 10 ply approx 10g per motif accessories a 4 5mm hook or preferred size correct gauge is not important for this pattern samples use classic 8 ply cherry red 4 00mm hook cotton 10 ply buttercream 4 50mm hook luxury 10 ply soft jade 6 00mm hook abbreviations chain= chain slip_stitch= slip_stitch double_crochet = double_crochet half_double_crochet = half treble treble_crochet = treble space = space/s front using 4 50mm hook make 5ch and join with sl stitch to make a ring 1st round 3ch 1tr in ring 3 chain 3tr in ring 4 times 3ch 1tr in ring slip_stitch in 3rd chain at beg 2nd round 2ch counts as half_double_crochet * 3tr 3ch 3tr in next 3ch space miss 1tr 1htr in next treble_crochet repeat from * 3 times 3tr 3ch 3tr in last 3ch space slip_stitch in 2nd chain at beg 3rd round work 1dc in space before first treble_crochet *miss 3tr 3tr 5ch 3tr in next 3ch space miss 3tr 1dc in space before next st miss half_double_crochet 1dc in spbefore next st repeat from * 3 times miss 3tr 3tr 5ch 3tr in next 3ch space miss 3tr 1dc inspbefore nextst misshtr slip_stitch in first double_crochet fasten_off to make up gently press if desired with a warm iron sew in ends or they can be used to create a hanging loop or attach to a gift key chain chain slip st slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet half treble half_double_crochet treble treble_crochet crochet star motif 8 ply or 10 ply
